entry.title: $2200 // Pacific St; Large 2BR, SepKitchen, SS Appliances. Great 4 Couple/Share
entry.content:
Large 2BR in elevator building
Separate kitchen w/stainless steel appliances
Spacious living room, lots of sunlight
Great closets, wood floors, full bathroom
Great views. Great sunlight!
Great for couple or shares
Pets on approval :)Near laundry, shops, cafes
Near Trains
Available Sept 1

CALL BROKER FOR AN APPOINTMENT: 646-431-7813
1MONTHFEES.COM..don't pay more
